data.name: Groove Gunner
data.detailed_description:
Groove Gunner is a VR rhythm game where you blast targets accurately timed to beats with matching visual effects, while playing through songs from a variety of musical artists.

If you or your band have a song that you would like considered for the game, please visit the groove gunner website on the right of the store page for more information.

Join our Discord community, https://discord.groovegunner.com

Features

  • A new take on VR rhythm - Accurately timed and aimed shots feel satisfying and natural. A mix of shooting targets and blocking projectiles makes you feel like a true marksman.
  • Custom light shows and themes for each song - For each song in the game we also create a light and stage show with assets from musical artists, album covers, live footage and images. It feels like you are at a live show!
  • Quick to get started - Groove Gunner is quick and easy to get started with simple, intuitive controls. With an eclectic assortment of songs, everyone will be grooving along in no time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVNVIDIA GTX 550 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
